author: Irene Jiang
title: 'There's a T-Rex in Walmart!' People are now wearing dinosaur suits to go grocery shopping, and people on Twitter are thanking them for it
description: Now that face coverings are recommending in public, people have come up with creative ways to protect themselves. One of the most creative solutions that's becoming a widespread trend is wearing a T-Rex costume to go grocery shopping. In addition to three rep…
content:
On April 1, Sebastian Dominguez swaggered into a Target wearing an inflatable T-Rex costume.
The Davies, Florida man was recorded by his wife, Aurora Dominguez, as he waddled about in the store and struggled to reach products with his tiny dino arms. His fri… [+1741 chars]
